attributes.action: Freeze OR decrease Council tax during COVID 19 crisis. NO TO COUNCIL TAX.
attributes.additional_details: This is a global crisis.  So parliament would save lives if they take action. It's been declined before, however Prime minister and parliament absolutely need to reconsider this matter.
attributes.background: Very obvious reason. Desperate times for desperate measures.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
